traits.name: Regrowth
entries: When a mold spider dies, unless fire destroyed it, it releases spores that regrow a mold spider in 3 days.

traits.name: Spider Climb
entries: The mold spider can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

actions.name: Claw
entries: Melee atk +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 1 slashing damage.
